.container {
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 960px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 20px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
.column,
.columns {
  width: 100%;
  float: left;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
